column4: is there still on way to downgrade ubuntu? Half of my boots fail, unity2d is the only thing I can get to boot (barely though), as of this morning sound completely broke, unity dash doesn't show apps anymore (only files), ...
next time i'll wait 6 months with the upgrade
did you try a live CD, a fresh install of 11.10 might be better than an upgrade
I can't reinstall my machine every 6 months
